description:
Watch how a D.E.I. consultant magically turns a video game into... well, something else entirely.

Have you had it with the "questionable" content targeting your kids? Check out @TruPlay-Games, the mobile app that builds character and nurtures faith. Use code 'babylonbee10': https://truplay.games/bb

title: How Video Games Are Made In The Current Year
